objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='diagonalGrad' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#1A3E5D'/><stop offset='49%' style='stop-color:#2A5F8F'/><stop offset='50%' style='stop-color:#3B7EB6'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#68A4DA'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='topGlow' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFFFFF;stop-opacity:0.3'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFFFFF;stop-opacity:0'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#diagonalGrad)'/><path d='M1080 0 L0 1080 L1080 1080 Z' fill='#ECF4FF' opacity='0.9'/><circle cx='200' cy='200' r='120' fill='url(#topGlow)' opacity='0.4'/><circle cx='980' cy='980' r='80' fill='#1A3E5D' opacity='0.2'/><path d='M1080 0 L540 540 L1080 540 Z' fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='0.05'/><path d='M0 480 L480 0 L0 0 Z' fill='#68A4DA' opacity='0.1'/><g fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='0.05'><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='5'/><circle cx='150' cy='100' r='5'/><circle cx='200' cy='100' r='5'/><circle cx='250' cy='100' r='5'/><circle cx='100' cy='150' r='5'/><circle cx='150' cy='150' r='5'/><circle cx='200' cy='150' r='5'/><circle cx='250' cy='150' r='5'/><circle cx='100' cy='200' r='5'/><circle cx='150' cy='200' r='5'/><circle cx='200' cy='200' r='5'/><circle cx='250' cy='200' r='5'/></g><g fill='#1A3E5D' opacity='0.1'><circle cx='830' cy='830' r='5'/><circle cx='880' cy='830' r='5'/><circle cx='930' cy='830' r='5'/><circle cx='980' cy='830' r='5'/><circle cx='830' cy='880' r='5'/><circle cx='880' cy='880' r='5'/><circle cx='930' cy='880' r='5'/><circle cx='980' cy='880' r='5'/><circle cx='830' cy='930' r='5'/><circle cx='880' cy='930' r='5'/><circle cx='930' cy='930' r='5'/><circle cx='980' cy='930' r='5'/></g></svg>

objects.text:
• 100% Pure, Farm-Sourced
• No artificial additives
• Rich in nutrients & calcium
• Eco-friendly glass packaging

product_details.name: Farm Fresh Premium Dairy Collection - Pure & Wholesome Milk
product_details.description:
• 100% Pure, Fresh Farm-Sourced Milk
• No artificial additives or preservatives
• Rich in essential nutrients and calcium
• Available in various container sizes for convenience
• Perfect for cooking, baking, and direct consumption
• Pasteurized for safety while maintaining natural taste
• Carefully handled and bottled to ensure maximum freshness
• Ideal source of protein and vitamins
• Recyclable glass packaging - eco-friendly choice
• Direct from local dairy farms to your table

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a dynamic diagonal gradient background transitioning from deep navy (#1A3E5D) to light sky blue (#68A4DA), complemented by soft accents and decorative circular elements to add a modern, clean aesthetic. Boldly emphasized at the top is a prominent, uppercase heading (“heading”) in white, followed by a strong subheading (“subheading”), and a clean dividing line (“decorative”) below. The “product_title” introduces the offer, while “description” text outlines product benefits in a neatly formatted bullet list. A contrasting yellow tagline (“tagline”) grabs attention above the large white pricing (“price”). The bright yellow “cta_background” with bold blue “cta” text prompts immediate action. A line of urgency (“urgency_text”) beneath reinforces the limited-time offer. On the right, a photorealistic “product_image” of branded glass-packaged dairy products further strengthens the message.

**Color Palette**
- Deep Navy: #1A3E5D  
- Medium Blue: #2A5F8F  
- Light Sky Blue: #68A4DA  
- Pale Blue Tint: #ECF4FF  
- Bright Yellow: #FFD700  
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a combination of clean, minimalistic colors dominated by shades of white and light blue, which evoke purity and freshness. The milk itself is a soft, creamy white (#FAF9F6), representing cleanliness and health. Transparent glassware incorporates icy blue tones (#A9CCE3 for highlights, #D6EAF8 for softer reflections), giving a cool and refreshing touch. These colors blend smoothly with natural light reflections but are also distinct enough to stand out. To create an advertisement banner, use a calming color palette: Cream White (#FAF9F6), Sky Blue (#A9CCE3), Glassy Blue (#D6EAF8), Soft Gray (#BCC6CC), and Clear White (#FFFFFF).
